title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 76.9 - Inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 76.9 - Inspection of records

State Regulations

All records in the possession of the employer or its officers
or agents which have a bearing on the participation of employees in the plan, or which otherwise have any bearing on the administration or operation of the
plan, shall be open to the inspection of representatives of the president and
the insurers at reasonable times. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
76.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
